programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the director of SUPERBAD comes a coming-of-age comedy of big dreams, hysterical consequences, and young love, set in a run-down amusement park.

programme.title: Forces of Nature, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben is trying to get to Savannah for his wedding. A seagull flies into the engine as his plane is taking off. All later flights are canceled because of an approaching hurricane, so he hitches a ride in with an attractive woman named Sara.

programme.title: A Little Bit of Heaven, (2011, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A young woman (Kate Hudson) who uses her humor to avoid intimacy has a life-changing visit from her doctor in this divinely funny dramatic comedy. With Whoopi Goldberg and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Out of Time, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in this spell-binding thriller as the Chief of Police of a small town who finds himself caught in the eye of a storm as he investigates the murder of a woman he was secretly seeing….because all the evidence points to him!

programme.title: Killerman, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: LIAM HEMSWORTH stars in this gritty action thriller. After a car crash leaves money launderer Moe Diamond with no memory, millions in cash, and dirty cops hunting him down, he must race to survive in New York City's criminal underworld.

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Primal Fear, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Courtroom thriller about a slick, hotshot lawyer (Richard Gere) who takes the seemingly unwinnable case of a young altar boy (Edward Norton) accused of murdering an eminent catholic priest.

programme.title: Blue Ruin, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: BLUE RUIN is a classic American revenge story, following a mysterious outsider whose quiet life is turned upside down when he returns to his childhood home, determined to carry out an act of vengeance.

programme.title: Killerman, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: LIAM HEMSWORTH stars in this gritty action thriller. After a car crash leaves money launderer Moe Diamond with no memory, millions in cash, and dirty cops hunting him down, he must race to survive in New York City's criminal underworld.

programme.title: Valkyrie, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: In WWII, a group of German officers plot to assassinate Hitler and seize control of the military command to end the war. The operation was code-named "Valkyrie", for the plan that was meant to be used in case of a revolt against the Nazi government.

programme.title: Memento, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

programme.title: The General's Daughter, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: There's the right way, the wrong way and the Army way. But there's no way military investigator Paul Brenner is going to participate in a cover-up when Fort MacCallum officials try to hide the motive behind the murder of a female officer.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Romance)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: From the Oscar-winning producers of 12 Years a Slave comes a powerful true story starring David Oyelewo and Oprah Winfrey. Facing violent opposition, Martin Luther King, Jr., led a historic march from Selma to Montgomery, changing the world forever.

programme.title: Almost Famous, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

programme.title: Eighth Grade, (2018, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Thirteen-year-old Kayla endures the tidal wave of contemporary suburban adolescence as she makes her way through the last week of middle school—the end of her thus far disastrous eighth grade year—before she begins high school.

programme.title: Hyena Road, (2015, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Three men, three different paths, caught in conflict but brought together to save lives: a highly skilled sniper who can’t think of his targets as human, an intelligence officer who has never killed while on duty.

programme.title: Almost Famous, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

programme.title: Woman Walks Ahead, (2018, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this riveting western follows a headstrong New York widow (Jessica Chastain) as she journeys west to meet Sioux chief Sitting Bull, facing off with an army officer (Sam Rockwell) intent on war with Native Americans.

programme.title: Lawless, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, and Jessica Chastain star in this adaptation of 'The Wettest County in the World.' A bootlegging gang make a run for the American Dream during Prohibition.

programme.title: Sweetwater, (2013, Western)
programme.desc: In the late 1800s, a fanatical religious leader, a renegade Sheriff, and a former prostitute collide in a blood triangle on the rugged plains of the New Mexico Territory.

programme.title: Blueberry, (2004, Western)
programme.desc: In 1870, after a brutal run-in with an outlaw in a brothel, Mike Blueberry becomes marshal in Arizona

programme.title: Bull, (2020, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Kris is forced to help her neighbor, an ex-bull rider scraping by on the Texas rodeo circuit.

programme.title: Frank and Jesse, (1994, Western)
programme.desc: After the defeat of the South in the Civil War and the murder of their younger brother, Frank and Jesse James seek their own brand of justice. As outlaws, they gain fame for their daring hold-ups of banks, trains, and stagecoaches.

programme.title: Brimstone, (2017, Western)
programme.desc: A triumphant thriller set in the menacing inferno of the old American West, Brimstone tells the story of Liz, a genuine survivor who is hunted by a vengeful Preacher for a crime she didn’t commit.

programme.title: Renegade, (2012, Western)
programme.desc: Mattie, a young lady living in a mine camp of the Southwest, unwittingly marries a claim jumper despite the fact she is in love with a gold miner. Soon, the Old West brings her death, confusion and the hard reality of her claim jumping husband.

programme.title: End of the Rope, (2024, Western)
programme.desc: Based on a true story. Sheriff Jacobson and Attorney Taylor investigate the disappearance of the Haven Family while facing a town bent on vengeance against suspect Charles Bannon.

programme.title: The Phantom, (1996, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: The story begins as an expedition lands on the island of Bengalla, seeking the skulls of Touganda. Believed to harness an energy force of power, they could spell disaster for mankind.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers, (2011, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: A gifted ensemble cast sparks this bold retelling of Alexander Dumas’ classic tale of friendship and heroism. With Christoph Waltz as wily Cardinal Richelieu.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Adventure)
programme.desc: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th-century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

programme.title: The Phantom, (1996, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: The story begins as an expedition lands on the island of Bengalla, seeking the skulls of Touganda. Believed to harness an energy force of power, they could spell disaster for mankind.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Fantasy)

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of her…earning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: Warrior, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.

programme.title: Scary Movie, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: The spoof that started it all. Scream with the Wayans brothers, Carmen Electra, Shannon Elizabeth, and Anna Faris as they bumble and shriek their way to horror-movie hilarity in Scary Movie.

programme.title: Scary Movie 2, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Four teens are tricked by their professor into visiting a haunted house for a school project.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: David Zucker (AIRPLANE!) directs SCARY MOVIE 3, which piles on hysterical, yet gratuitous, cameos with thrillers, blockbusters, and pop-culture in general getting their best goosing yet.

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the director of SUPERBAD comes a coming-of-age comedy of big dreams, hysterical consequences, and young love, set in a run-down amusement park.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Uptown Girls, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Molly Gunn is the daughter of a late rock legend, and the toast of New York City. But when her inheritance is stolen, Molly is forced to do something she's never done before - get a job. Molly becomes a nanny to a girl, who is "eight going on forty."

programme.title: Eighth Grade, (2018, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Thirteen-year-old Kayla endures the tidal wave of contemporary suburban adolescence as she makes her way through the last week of middle school—the end of her thus far disastrous eighth grade year—before she begins high school.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer.

programme.title: Bats, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Genetically mutated bats escape, and it's up to a bat expert and the local sheriff to stop them.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Rollerball, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jonathan Cross (Chris Klein) is an all-American hotshot, the most popular player in the fastest and most extreme sport of all time: Rollerball.

programme.title: Anti-Trust, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: When Milo graduates from college and lands his dream job writing software at a multi-billion dollar computer company, he couldn't be more thrilled. The company's founder that he worshipped as a child is now his personal mentor.

programme.title: Stargate, (1994, Adventure)
programme.desc: When an ancient Egyptian artifact is discovered, two men unlock its secret power as a portal through time and space.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: When a family moves from the city to a centuries-old house in rural Georgia, they are terrorized by malicious spirits seeking revenge.

programme.title: Hereditary, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: When the matriarch of the Graham family passes away, her daughter (Toni Collette) and grandchildren begin to unravel cryptic and increasingly terrifying secrets about their ancestry, trying to outrun the sinister fate they have inherited.

programme.title: It Comes At Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families forced to share a home form an uneasy alliance in an attempt to keep the outside evil at bay—only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: Hush, (2016, Horror)
programme.desc: A deaf and mute writer who retreated into the woods to live a solitary life must fight for her life in silence when a masked killer appears at her window.

programme.title: The Babadook, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a mother must protect her son from an evil, supernatural entity that has escaped the pages of a children's book and is lurking in their home.

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the terrifying novel by Stephen King... After the Creed family moves to rural Maine, they stumble upon an ancient burial ground with sinister powers. When tragedy strikes, a perilous chain of events unleashes an unfathomable evil.

programme.title: Let The Right One In, (2008, Horror)
programme.desc: Lonely, 12-year-old Oskar is bullied by his classmates. A new friendship develops when Eli, a pale young girl who only comes out at night, moves in next door. Coinciding with her arrival is a series of inexplicable disappearances and murders.

programme.title: Abattoir, (2016, Horror)

programme.title: My Left Foot, (1989, Biographical Drama)

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Comedy)

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)

programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.desc: Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine and Fred MacMurray are superb in this tale of love and ambition in the world of big business that went on to garner a Best Picture Oscar.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar®-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: Blue Velvet, (1986, Thriller)
programme.desc: A sensual mystery thriller about strange happenings in a small North Carolina town. A college student stumbles across a bizarre mystery and wants to know more, perhaps too much more.

programme.desc: Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine and Fred MacMurray are superb in this tale of love and ambition in the world of big business that went on to garner a Best Picture Oscar.

programme.title: Runaway Bride, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Julia Roberts plays a small-town girl whose marches down the aisle become a series of near Mrs. when she bolts before saying "I do."

programme.title: Big Night, (1996, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In a restaurant run by two Italian immigrants, the tables sit empty despite the extraordinary talents of Primo the chef (Tony Shalhoub, “Monk”) and the ambitious efforts of his brother Secondo (Stanley Tucci).

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral, (1994, Romance)
programme.desc: A reserved Englishman meets attractive American Carrie at a wedding and falls in love with her, but his inability to express his feelings seems to forestall any possibility of relationship - until they meet again and again.

programme.title: The Birdcage, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Robin Williams, Gene Hackman, Nathan Lane and Dianne Wiest lead the laughs in this wild Comedy that insists you don't have to be a woman to be a mother.

programme.title: American Beauty, (1999, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Lester's life is far from perfect. As he makes a few changes in his life, the freer and the happier he gets. However, Lester is about to learn that the ultimate freedom comes at a price.

programme.title: Sliding Doors, (1998, Romance)
programme.desc: The split-second moments that can take a life down one path instead of another form the tantalizing 'what if?' in this delightful romantic comedy starring Gwyneth Paltrow.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Paul Newman earned an Oscar nomination plus Best Actor honors from the National Society of Film Critics and New York Film Critics Circle for his portrayal of Sully, a likeable working stiff whos made a lifetime of bad decisions.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Music)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Meatballs, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars as Tripper who guides a fun-seeking collection of lovable campers and libidinous staff members through the unique pleasures of a hysterical coed summer experience.

programme.title: Semi-Tough, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Barbara Jane (Jill Clayburgh), Billy Clyde (Burt Reynolds) and Shake (Kris Kristofferson) have been best friends for years. But when Barbara Jane's new interest in Shake turns into love, Billy Clyde realizes she's the woman he’s wanted all along!

programme.title: North Dallas Forty, (1979, Comedy)
programme.desc: In a society in which major league sporting events have replaced Sunday worship as the religion of choice, North Dallas Forty appears like a desecration at the altar.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: North Dallas Forty, (1979, Comedy)
programme.desc: In a society in which major league sporting events have replaced Sunday worship as the religion of choice, North Dallas Forty appears like a desecration at the altar.

programme.title: Convoy, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei and the gang trail Lazar to the local mall hoping to reacquire the engine design program that this window-shopping, noodle-eating crook stole from them.
programme.sub-title: Get With the Program: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei and Lazar are trapped in a warehouse where their only chance of escaping is if Yusei can outduel a Guard Bot whose CPU has been uploaded with all of Yusei's battle techniques.
programme.sub-title: Get With the Program: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After being charged with crimes he didn't commit, Jack Atlas scrambles to uncover the truth before his friends and fans turn their back on him for good.
programme.sub-title: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Jack Atlas on the run, Yusei and Crow set out in search of their pal, hoping to clear his good name before bad turns to worse.
programme.sub-title: Will The Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Zora's stubborn son Leon suddenly returns home, Crow picks a duel with him to help him realize that the ongoing quarrel he has with his mother is much ado about nothing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Yusei heads to a tumbleweed town at the request of some locals, he quickly finds himself in the middle of two feuding families - with his old friend Kalin right there with him!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Yusei challenges Kalin to a duel, he hopes to save his old acquaintance from a terrible fate. However, the dueling gets dicey when it becomes clear that Kalin doesn't necessarily want to be saved!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As Yusei continues to duel his best to save Kalin from a most unhappy ending, he suddenly finds himself double crossed by his supposed allies and in desperate need of some saving of his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After being double crossed and sent to the mines by his supposed allies, Yusei hatches a plan to escape. Can Yusei find a way out, or will he and Kalin be forced to work the mines forever?
programme.sub-title: The Race to Escape: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: It's a high-speed minecart chase as Kalin and Yusei scramble to rescue Sergio's family from the clutches of the Crash Town mine. When Lawton and his goons gain up on the fleeing family, things take a heartbreaking turn.
programme.sub-title: The Race to Escape: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The sinister Lawton has captured West and Nico and gained control of Crash Town, but Yusei and Kalin have no intention of letting him get away with it. It's the ultimate showdown as the dueling duo confront Lawton in a winner-takes-all battle.
programme.sub-title: Clash at Crash Town: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the clash between Lawton, Yusei and Kalin comes to a climactic close, Yusei and Kalin must figure out a way to defeat Lawton before his deck destroys their dreams of freeing everyone in the mines.
programme.sub-title: Clash at Crash Town: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Sherry breaks into a city building in search of answers about a very special duel card, she finds a lot more than she bargained for.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Crow looks to avenge a missing colleague, he ends up finding an old friend who turns out not to be what he seems.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Crow takes on an old friend in a duel to determine the truth about a colleague's mysterious disappearance.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: A little fender bender turns into a friendly duel when Crow smashes into one of Team Unicorn's duelists on the tournament practice lanes only this was no accident and Team Unicorn's intentions are anything but friendly.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: New threats are on the horizon and no one can be trusted. Sherry arrives to inform Yusei that she suspects the sinister forces of Iliaster have infiltrated the tournament.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Can Jack and his power-packed deck bring down his opponent or will Andre's secret plan place Jack and Team 5D's on the brink of elimination?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Team Unicorn taking the early lead against Team 5D's, all eyes turn to Akiza as she takes to the track hoping to take down Andre and even up the score.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Jack and Akiza already defeated, Yusei finds himself having to defeat all three members of Team Unicorn on his own. Can Yusei come up with a comeback that will wrangle the win away from Team Unicorn?
programme.sub-title: The Edge of Elimination: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei must figure out a way to defeat all three members of Team Unicorn before his deck is drained of all its duel cards.
programme.sub-title: The Edge of Elimination: Part II

programme.desc: In the climactic conclusion to the first round of the World Racing Grand Prix, Yusei must figure out a way to defeat Team Catastrophe's captain before all the cards in his deck disappear.
programme.sub-title: The Edge of Elimination: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After snatching victory from the jaws of defeat in the first round of the World Racing Grand Prix, Team 5D's celebrates their win and prepares for their next opponent  Team Catastrophe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: In the second round of the World Racing Grand Prix, Crow of Team 5D's gets set to take on Team Catastrophe's Herman. Can Crow swoop in and swipe all of Herman's life points?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Crow of Team 5D's looks to give Herman's Hook the Hidden Knight the heave-ho before it ruins his Runner and catapults Team Catastrophe into the next round.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Primo and his Duel Bot Army crash the World Racing Grand Prix, putting the tournament and New Domino City in jeopardy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Primo decides to take matters into his own hands by challenging Yusei Fudo to a duel after watching Yusei interfere with his Duel Bot Army's mission of mechanized mayhem.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Hoping to stop New Domino City from spiraling into total chaos, Yusei takes on Primo and his Meklord Emperors' debilitating ability to absorb Synchro Monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the safety of New Domino City hanging in the balance and Primo in control of Stardust Dragon, Yusei must figure out a way to get his go-to card back before his life points hit zero.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: It's the climactic conclusion to the battle between Yusei and Primo! Can Yusei defeat this menace and save his City, or will Primo prevail and send New Domino spiraling into chaos?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei and Team 5D's get set to take on Team Ragnarok and their powerful Nordic Gods  Thor, Loki and Odin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Jack is informed by Team Ragnarok's Dragan that Director Goodwin fixed the match they had years earlier, Jack begins to doubt his Turbo Dueling talents. Can Jack kick things into overdrive?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Determined to defeat Dragan and his Nordic God, Jack summons a mighty new monster to the field that has enough fire power to send all of Dragan's life points up in smoke!

programme.title: After finding out that Luffy ate the whole pot ofthe red-bean soup that she was looking for, Big Mom becomes infuriated and goesafter him. Meanwhile, Queen, the Lead Performer, comes up with a plan to stopthe rampaging Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Stop the Emperor of the Sea! Queen's Secret Plan!

programme.title: Queen hastily ties up the sleeping Big Mom and carries her to Onigashima leaving Udon to Babanuki. Babanuki uses a weapon that Queen made to threaten inmates and make them catch Luffy, but a mysterious figure emerges from the forbidden cell to save Luffy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Brutal Ammunition! The Plague Rounds Aim at Luffy!

programme.title: Kawamatsu the Kappa is freed and stands up against Babanuki and his underlings! Listening to Old Man Hyo's suggestion, Raizo and Kiku reveal their true identities which give the desperate prisoners not only a shock but also some hope.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start Fighting Back! Luffy and the Akazaya Samurai!

programme.title: Luffy faces those who are infected by the Plague Rounds and the non-infected prisoners who submit to the authority of Udon. To open their eyes, Luffy takes a measure that will risk his life. However, the Chief Warden Babanuki has something up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: We’re Here to Win! Luffy's Desperate Scream!

programme.title: The freed prisoners in Udon refuse to fight alongside Luffy because he is a pirate. Raizo and Old Man Hyo try their best to convince them, but an unexpected person stands up to bring the prisoners hope after taking down Kaido!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Warriors' Dream! Luffy's Conquer of Udon!

programme.title: After standing against Orochi, Zoro and Hiyori are chased by Orochi's ninja group. Meanwhile, Orochi is told that they captured Trafalgar Law as the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Orochi's Hunting Party! The Ninja Group vs. Zoro!

programme.title: Nami and Franky join Kanjuro who has taken Yasuie's dead body to bury him with Oden, and together they hit the road. Robin, Usopp, and Brook are at the dock trying to figure out a way to pass through a check point.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Tension Rises in Onigashima! Two Emperors of the Sea Meet?!

programme.title: As the clash between Kaido and Big Mom continues, Queen looks for a way to get out of Onigashima. Meanwhile in Udon, Old Man Hyo finds his former allies, four bosses from each region.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiyori's Confession! A Reunion at Bandit's Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro runs after the warrior-monk who took his Shusui and Kawamatsu shares with Hiyori his memory of a fox that was guarding the graves in Ringo. As they catch up to Zoro, they find a room filled with swords.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Its Name is Enma! Oden's Great Swords!

programme.title: As the day of the raid approaches, Law finds someone who might help him escape the prison and Kin'emon gathers up most of his main allies to discuss the raid plan. Meanwhile, at Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom make a stunning declaration!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Alliance?! Kaido’s Army Gathers!

programme.title: Kin'emon, Momonosuke, and the others can't fight back tears when they hear that Hiyori is alive. Zoro is stunned by Enma's demonic power and its ties to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!

programme.title: The resolution that passed the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, a Navy captain Koby secretly contacts someone who is currently in the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big News! An Incident That Will Affect the Seven Warlords!

programme.title: Admiral Issho and Fleet Admiral Sakazuki argue over the abolition of the Seven Warlord system and the alliance of the two Emperors of the Sea. Meanwhile, ex-Fleet Admiral Sengoku teaches the young Navy soldiers about the legendary Rocks Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger!

programme.title: On the day of the Fire Festival, Orochi leaves the mainland of the Land of Wano heading for Onigashima where a big banquet will take place.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rendezvous Port! The Land of Wano Act Three Begins!

programme.title: The night before the great battle, Orochi orders the destruction of the Sunny along with some bridges across the country to block Akazaya samurai's allies from their rendezvous.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Number-One Samurai in the Land of Wano! Here comes Kozuki Oden!

programme.title: When the angry mountain god, the giant boar, almost kills Kin'emon, Oden steps in. Kin'emon is impressed when he sees Oden's strength and pledges his life to serve him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Tearfully Swearing Allegiance! Oden and Kin'emon!

programme.title: Oden transforms the wild land of Kuri into a habitable region and is made Daimyo over it. Then he meets Kawamatsu the Kappa and the two Minks, Dogstorm and Cat Viper, who become his followers like the others.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Changing Destiny! The Whitebeard Pirates Cast Ashore!

programme.title: Whitebeard and his crew dock at one of the ports in the Land of Wano with their broken ship and the news excites Oden. He runs to the port and asks Whitebeard to let him get on board the ship but the request is rejected.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Oden's journey finally begins. He is in awe of all the things that he has never seen before. And for the first time in his life, he becomes a wanted person and makes the headlines which catches the eye of a high-profile figure.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Whitebeard's Little Brother! Oden's Great Adventure!

programme.title: In the Land of Wano, the Shogun Sukiyaki falls critically ill and names Orochi proxy Shogun until Oden returns in case he dies.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Roger is amazed when he finds out that Oden can read the script on the Ponegliff since he believes it will guide him to the last, undiscovered island where no man has ever been.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Singing out loud, the Roger Pirates continue on with their journey. They soar up to the island above the clouds and go down into the deep sea to get to the island at the sea bottom.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Oden and the Roger Pirates head for the Land of Wano to obtain a copy of the Road Ponegliff. Oden sees Kin'emon and the others for the first time in years, but he immediately returns to the sea leaving his wife and children behind.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Pirates is Born! Arriving at the Last Island!

programme.title: After reaching Laugh Tale, Roger declares the disbanding of his pirate group and disembarks first. Oden gets dropped off at the Land of Wano and reunites with his family and retainers.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Land of Wano! The Roger Pirates Disband!

programme.title: Enraged by Orochi's tyrannical acts, Oden raids his castle in the Flower Capital and points his sword at Orochi. However, hours later, people who were waiting for Oden to come out after defeating Orochi see the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sad News! The Opening of the Great Pirate Era!

programme.title: Oden keeps dancing naked in the Flower Capital and losing all the trust of the people. One day, Orochi comes to Kuri and reveals his evil plan for the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Raid! Oden and the Akazaya Nine!

programme.title: Kaido comes to the mainland along with his troops to fight against Oden and the Akazaya samurai who were on their way to raid Kaido's mansion. Even though Oden's group are unprepared and outnumbered, they fight hard to save the future of the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Battle! Oden vs. Kaido!

programme.title: Oden and the Akazaya members are sentenced to death by boiling in a pot. Oden asks for a chance to survive which is accepted by Kaido. Then, Oden enters the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Boiled to Death! Oden's One-hour Struggle!

programme.title: As Oden continues trying to survive in the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head, people learn the truth from Shinobu and get shocked. At the same time, Oden tells his retainers the importance of opening the borders of the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Oden Wouldn't Be Oden If It Wasn't Boiled!

programme.title: As Kin'emon and the others run to Oden Castle to save Oden's family, the castle is set on fire and Kaido attacks Toki and her children.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Castle on Fire! The Fate of the Kozuki Clan!

programme.title: The day of the Fire Festival has finally come and the whole army is now getting ready to head for Onigashima to raid Kaido!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and thousands of allies who were supposed to be there are nowhere to be found, but Kin'emon and the others decide to set sail to the stormy sea in a small boat.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sea Is For Pirates! Raid! To Onigashima!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, and Kid join the Akazaya samurai and begin to fight Kaido's army. The three rivals from the Worst Generation compete with each other as they attack the enemy fleet with their ultimate skills.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Generation Charges in! The Battle of the Stormy Sea!

programme.title: Source Code, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in this action thriller about a man who awakens in another man’s body to discover only he has the ability to stop a terrorist attack on a commuter train.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Tank Girl, (1995, Adventure)
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: The Way West, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Icons Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum and Richard Widmark star in this sumptuous, epic tale of the brave men and women in the U.S. who left the comfort and safety of life in the East for the promise of free land a better life in the untamed West.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Western)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: Man With The Gun, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum portrays an Exterminator--in the American West. He will, for a price, eliminate any outlaws annoying the peace of any Western town. When his wife, in disgust, leaves him, he pursues her, only to encounter his greatest gunfighting challenge.

programme.title: Blue Montana Skies, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry heads North to apprehend fur smugglers plundering the trappers' pelts, and then return to the U.S. When the trail leads to the H-H dude ranch owned by a beautiful gal, the action heats up.

programme.title: Home on the Prairie, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Livestock inspectors Gene Autry and Frog Millhouse are accused of favoritism when they try to help an old rancher and his attractive daughter whose cattle appear have hoof and mouth disease and are doomed to be destroyed.

programme.title: Back In The Saddle, (1941, Western)
programme.desc: When pollution poisons hundreds of cattle, Gene Autry, faces trouble from all sides. Originally released in 1941, this film features Gene's signature song and his lovable sidekick, Smiley Burnette.

programme.title: Mountain Rhythm, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Unscrupulous Pueblo Springs Valley resort owners wreak havoc for Frogís Aunt Mathilda and neighboring ranchers in an effort to scare them off land recently placed for sale by the US Government.

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: Canadian Pacific, (1949, Western)
programme.desc: A surveyor for the Canadian Pacific Railroad must fight fur trappers who oppose the building of the railroad by stirring up Indian rebellion.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason, (2004, Comedy)

programme.title: Sr. & Sra. Smith, (2005)
programme.desc: 2005. Um casal entediado fica surpreso ao descobrir que ambos são assassinos contratados por agências rivais para se matarem. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn, Adam Brody, Kerry Washington, Chris Weitz, Rachael Huntley, Keith David, Michelle Monaghan, Stephanie March Diretor: Doug Liman

programme.title: Demolidor - O Homem sem Medo, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. Um homem cegado por resíduos tóxicos, que também ampliaram os seus outros sentidos, luta contra o crime como um super-herói acrobático das artes marciais. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Garner, Colin Farrell, Michael Clarke Duncan, Jon Favreau Diretor: Mark Steven Johnson

programme.title: Motoqueiro Fantasma: Espírito de Vingança, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Nove anos após se transformar no temido Motoqueiro Fantasma, Johnny Blaze se refugia para tentar controlar sua maldição e deixá-la escondida da maioria das pessoas. Ele leva uma vida solitária, até ser obrigado a entrar em ação novamente. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Cage, Elba, Idris, Nicolas Diretor: Mark Neveldine

programme.title: Redenção, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Jason Statham é um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grávida. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Agata Buzek, Jason Statham Diretor: Steven Knight

programme.title: O Homem da Máfia, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Um assalto a um jogo de pôquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da máfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional é contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitação de alguns dos participantes coloca a situação fora de controle. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Brad, Liotta, Pitt, Ray Diretor: Andrew Dominik

programme.title: Centurião, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. O Império Romano controla do Egito à Espanha, do leste até o Mar Negro. Entretanto ele enfrenta problemas no norte da Grã-Bretanha, devido às táticas de guerrilha usadas por seus inimigos. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Andreas Wisniewski, Axelle Carolyn, Dave Legeno, David Morrissey, Dhaffer L Abidine, Dominic West, Jj Feild, Lee Ross. Diretor: Neil Marshall

programme.title: Instinto Predador, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Frank capturou animais selvagens na selva brasileira, incluindo uma onça branca de 400 libras. Ele a envia no mesmo navio que um assassino preso. O assassino se liberta e liberta os animais. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Nicolas Cage¸ Framke Janssen, Kevin Durand, LaMonica Garrett Diretor: Nick Powell

programme.title: Linha de Ação, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem é o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordâncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenções por trás da investigação encomendada. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Crowe, Mark, Russell, Walberg Diretor: Allen Hughes

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Frank Martin é obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agência de Proteção Ambiental da Ucrânia, de Marselha a Odessa, além de dois sacos de conteúdo suspeito. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova, François Berléand, Jeroen Krabbé, Alex Kobold, David Atrakchi, Yann Sundberg, Eriq Ebouaney, David Kammenos Diretor: Olivier Megaton

programme.title: Xeque-Mate, (2006)
programme.desc: 2006. Um caso de identidade equivocada coloca Slevin no meio de uma guerra sendo tramada por dois dos chefes do crime mais rivais da cidade. Sob vigilância constante do detetive Brikowski e do assassino Goodkat, ele deve pegá-los antes que eles o peguem. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Josh Hartnett, Bruce Willis, Lucy Liu, Ben Kingsley, Morgan Freeman, Stanley Tucci Diretor: Paul McGuigan

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005)
programme.desc: 2005. Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jet Li, Bob Hoskins, Morgan Freeman Diretor: Louis Leterrier

programme.title: O Anjo da Morte, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Um policial disfarçado se aproxima de seu inimigo. Ela decide deixar um agente de confiança entrar em campo, mas tem dúvidas se ela tem o que é preciso para completar a missão. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Caçado, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. Aaron Hallam é um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vítimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caçadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Tommy Lee Jones, Connie Nielsen, Benicio Del Toro, Leslie Stefanson, John Finn, José Zúñiga, Ron Canada, Mark Pellegrino, Jenna Boyd, Aaron DeCone Diretor: William Friedkin

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Um bombeiro fora de serviço testemunha um assassinato nas mãos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteção a testemunhas até depor, mas não pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, então decide agir por conta própria. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Josh Duhamel, Bruce Willis, Rosario Dawson Diretor: David Barrett

programme.title: O Preço do Amanhã, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Em um futuro onde as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos, o dinheiro pode comprar juventude imortal. Will Salas é acusado de assassinato e foge com um refém que talvez possa quebrar o sistema. Gêneros: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Elenco: Justin Timberlake, Olivia Wilde, Shyloh Oostwald, Johnny Galecki, Colin McGurk Diretor: Andrew Niccol

programme.title: Revólver, (2005)
programme.desc: 2005. O jogador Jake Green entra em um jogo com consequências potencialmente mortais. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Ray Liotta, André Benjamin Diretor: Guy Ritchie

programme.title: A Arma, (2023)
programme.desc: 2023. Dallas é uma máquina de matar. Seus ataques a gangues de motociclistas e laboratórios de metanfetamina irritam o chefe da máfia de Las Vegas, que sequestra sua namorada. Dallas não irá parar até que a justiça seja feita. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Tony Schiena, AnnaLynne McCord, Sean Patrick Flanery, Cuba Gooding Jr. Diretor: Tony Schiena

O problema é que matam um agente disfarçado, o parceiro de Jimmy, para continuarem com a operação. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Wesley Snipes, Dennis Hopper, Lolita Davidovich Diretor: James B. Harris

programme.title: Taxi 3, (2002)

programme.title: Acima da Lei, (2019)

Damien e Leito estão retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma missão para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco líderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os serviços secretos da cidade tomem medidas drásticas para resolver o problema. Gêneros: Crime Elenco: Philippe Torreton, David Belle, Cyril Raffaelli Diretor: Patrick Alessandrin

programme.title: Demolidor - O Homem sem Medo, (2003)

Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Billy Bob Thornton, Kathy Bates, Tony Cox Diretor: Mark Waters

Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Patrick Dempsey, Ashley Judd, Tim Blake Nelson Diretor: Rob Minkoff

programme.title: Caindo na Estrada 2: O Jogo da Cerveja, (2009)

Três colegas de faculdade embarcam na jornada de suas vidas quando largam tudo para entrar em um ônibus cheio de modelos sedutoras e pouco vestidas para competir na maior das competições esportivas: o Torneio Nacional do Jogo da Cerveja. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Preston Jones, Michael Trotter, Daniel Newman, Nestor Aaron Absera, Danny Pudi, Julianna Guill, Julia Levy-Boeken Diretor: Steve Rash

Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Diane Keaton, Katie Holmes, Queen Latifah, Ted Danson, Adam Rothenberg Diretor: Callie Khouri

programme.title: Corrida Selvagem, (1970)

programme.title: O Imperador, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob, que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Cordeiros e Carrascos, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um advogado resolve trabalhar no caso de um guarda de prisão da África do Sul que se traumatizou pelas execuções em que participou. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Transmissões Sinistras, (1970)

programme.title: Condução Perigosa, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Simon Keller, um misterioso ladrão, planeja roubar um banco e obriga um antigo piloto de corrida a dirigir o carro de fuga. Após o roubo, eles enfrentam policiais e mafiosos em uma alucinante perseguição na costa da Austrália. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Deixados para Trás II - Comando Tribulação, (1970)

programme.title: Robo-Dog, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O cãozinho de Tyler sofre uma morte trágica, deixando o garoto extremamente entristecido. Usando uma superbateria, Tom, o pai de Tyler, cria um cão-robô para o filho. O problema é que o chefe de Tom está disposto a tudo para obter a superbateria. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Ruslan, um artista sonha em se tornar um cavaleiro, se apaixona por Mila. A felicidade deles não dura muito tempo. Chernomor, o malvado feiticeiro, rouba Mila diante dos olhos de Ruslan para transformar seu poder de amor em seu próprio poder mágico. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, a dona de casa Bridget é forçada a assumir um trabalho como auxiliar de limpeza na Casa da Moeda em Kansas City, Missouri, e acaba planejando o roubo de uma fortuna em notas gastas destinadas à destruição. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: A Gangue Zip Zap, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Os irmãos gêmeos Zip e Zap são enviados para uma escola muito rígida. O diretor é um homem muito bravo e que repudia qualquer forma de lazer. Cansados dessa situação, Zip e Zap formam um grupo para poder fazer suas travessuras e desafiar o diretor. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: O Doutor da Felicidade, (1970)

programme.title: Apostando Alto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Assim que Ella conhece Abel, sua vida, até então regrada, muda. Com esse amante que ela não consegue decifrar bem, a jovem descobre a Paris cosmopolita e subterrânea dos círculos do jogo, onde a adrenalina e o dinheiro reinam. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Big Kill - A Cidade do Medo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O destino leva um almofadinha da Filadélfia, dois jogadores desajustados em fuga e um religioso assassino a uma cidade em franca expansão chamada Big Kill. A. O que eles encontram no Oeste é uma jornada selvagem e uma luta pela sobrevivência. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: 2020. Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura se inscrevem oficialmente para a Prova Chunin e formam um time. Para passar, nenhum membro pode falhar. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam
programme.desc: Naruto: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam - T01E23

programme.title: 2020. Naruto e sua equipe iniciam a primeira prova. O examinador é Ibiki Morino, um jonin (ninja de alto nível) notório e perito em interrogração. Sasuke e Sakura estão preocupados, pois se Naruto responder tudo errado, eles também falharão. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Começa
programme.desc: Naruto: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Começa - T01E24

programme.title: 2020. A parte mais difícil da prova começa na pergunta 10. Antes dos ninjas escutarem a pergunta, Ibiki coloca uma regra injusta para o problema: quem responder errado será reprovado e não terá o direito de fazer qualquer Prova Chunin no futuro. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Décima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada
programme.desc: Naruto: A Décima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada - T01E25

programme.title: 2020. Konohamaru, neto do Terceiro Hokage da Aldeia da Folha, aparece durante a Prova Chunin com Moegi e Udon e cobre eventos para o jornal da Academia Ninja. Ele vê Naruto como um irmão mais velho e, entrevistando os personagens, reconta suas aventuras. Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Floresta Da Morte - T01E26

programme.title: 2020. Na floresta da morte começa a segunda parte da Prova Chunin. Cada time recebe um tipo de pergaminho e deve roubar o outro tipo de outro time, chegando ao ponto final na torre com os dois pergaminhos. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte
programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte - T01E27

programme.title: 2020. A segunda parte da prova começa na floresta da morte. Sasuke nota que um inimigo se disfarçou de Naruto. Sasuke salva e desamarra Naruto, e os três membros criam uma senha para quando ficarem separados outra vez. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pânico Na Floresta
programme.desc: Naruto: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pânico Na Floresta - T01E28

programme.title: 2020. O ataque do ninja da Grama é poderoso demais para Sasuke e Sakura. Sasuke pensa em entregar o pergaminho, mas Naruto o impede. A raiva de Naruto cresce e seus poderes são revelados. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda!
programme.desc: Naruto: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda! - T01E29

programme.title: 2020. Ao ver Naruto lutar contra o ninja da Grama, Sasuke percebe que estava errado em fugir. Sasuke usa todo o potencial do seu Sharingan para afastar o ninja. Ele se apresenta como Orochimaru, some e deixa uma Marca da Maldição em Sasuke, que cai em dor. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Dragão
programme.desc: Naruto: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Dragão - T01E30

programme.title: 2020. Depois de ver a reportagem, Anko percebe um intruso na prova, Orochimaru, mas não consegue detê-lo. Sakura, cansada e com medo, tenta impedir o inimigo. O autoproclamado demônio bonitão da Aldeia da Folha, Rock Lee, aparece para o resgate! Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Promessa Do "Sobrancelhudo": Amor Eterno E Proteção
programme.desc: Naruto: A Promessa Do "Sobrancelhudo": Amor Eterno E Proteção - T01E31

programme.title: 2020. Protegendo Sakura, que não consegue mais se mover, Lee luta contra os três ninja do Som. Ele usa sua habilidade secreta, mas é ineficaz. Dosu o ataca, e Lee cai. Para proteger as pessoas que são importantes para ela, Sakura se levanta... Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Sakura Floresce - T01E32

programme.title: 2020. Enquanto Sakura se defende dos ninjas do Som sozinha, o time rival Ino aparece! Depois de ver Sakura lutar contra os ninjas do Som, eles decidem ajudá-la. Com a formação de batalha "Ino-Shika-Cho", o time Ino tenta deter os atacantes… Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Formação De Batalha: Ino-Shika-Cho - T01E33

programme.title: 2020. Os ninjas do Som partem depois de enfrentar o poder de Sasuke. O time de Naruto tem um momento para se recuperar. Kiba consegue o segundo pergaminho e seu time vai em direção à torre. O parceiro canino de Kiba, Akamaru, nota algo adiante e para. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Akamaru Treme: A Força Cruel De Gaara
programme.desc: Naruto: Akamaru Treme: A Força Cruel De Gaara - T01E34

programme.title: 2020. Naruto e a equipe finalmente descansam. Já se passaram quatro dias desde o início da prova, restando apenas um para o fim. Naruto sugere duplicar o pergaminho do céu, que ainda precisam ter, e tenta abrir o pergaminho da terra, supostamente selado. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: O Segredo Do Pergaminho, Não É Permitido Olhar
programme.desc: Naruto: O Segredo Do Pergaminho, Não É Permitido Olhar - T01E35

programme.title: 2020. O time de Naruto se junta a Kabuto, mas eles são presos por um genjutsu (técnica ilusória). Eles caminham na mesma área várias vezes, perdem energia e lutam contra os vários clones criados pela técnica. Naruto os derrota, mas o número não diminui. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Clone Contra Clone: Os Meus São Melhores Que Os Seus
programme.desc: Naruto: Clone Contra Clone: Os Meus São Melhores Que Os Seus - T01E36

programme.title: 2020. Quando Naruto e seu time chegam à a torre e abrem os dois pergaminhos, Iruka aparece e explica o espírito do ninja chunin (nível médio) aos estudantes da Academia Ninja. Agora ele confia em Naruto e seu time. Anko fala com o Hokage sobre Orochimaru. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Sobrevivendo Ao Corte: Os Nove Novatos Juntos Outra Vez
programme.desc: Naruto: Sobrevivendo Ao Corte: Os Nove Novatos Juntos Outra Vez - T01E37

programme.title: 2020. Os 21 ninjas que passaram na segunda parte da prova se juntam para o próximo desafio. Seus rostos demonstram várias emoções profundas. Mas como um número muito alto passou na segunda prova, as preliminares da terceira começarão imediatamente... Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Estreitando O Campo, Morte Súbita, Eliminação!
programme.desc: Naruto: Estreitando O Campo, Morte Súbita, Eliminação! - T01E38

programme.title: 2020. Na terceira prova os combates são um contra um. O primeiro é entre Sasuke e Yoroi, o capanga de Orochimaru. Yoroi encurrala Sasuke, que não consegue usar seu Sharingan por causa da Marca da Maldição no pescoço. Yoroi absorve o chakra para fora de Sasuke. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: O Ciúme Do Sobrancelhudo, A Rajada De Leões Se Solta!
programme.desc: Naruto: O Ciúme Do Sobrancelhudo, A Rajada De Leões Se Solta! - T01E39

programme.title: 2020. Kakashi desfaz o feitiço de Sasuke, e Orochimaru aparece. Ele quer o poder de Sharingan que o clã Uchiha possui. Nas preliminares da terceira prova, Zaku da Aldeia Escondida do Som luta contra Shino da Aldeia Oculta da Folha. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Kakashi E Orochimaru Cara A Cara
programme.desc: Naruto: Kakashi E Orochimaru Cara A Cara - T01E40

programme.title: 2020. O próximo combate é entre o membro do time de Gaara, Kankuro, e o capanga de Orochimaru, Misumi. Misumi captura Kankuro, usando um corpo que consegue deslocar suas partes e juntas. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Explosão Kunoichi: As Rivais Se Enfrentam
programme.desc: Naruto: Explosão Kunoichi: As Rivais Se Enfrentam - T01E41

programme.title: 2020. O quarto combate é entre Sakura e Ino, amigas de infância e ambas apaixonadas por Sasuke. Embora Sakura tenha admirado Ino desde pequena, ela não hesita em enfrentá-la, e as duas ninjas aparentam ter o mesmo nível e determinação. Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Batalha Final: Cha! - T01E42

programme.title: 2020. O quinto combate é entre Tenten e Temari. Tenten, mestre em armas aéreas e várias outras, que são repelidas pelo leque de Temari. O sexto combate é entre Shikamaru e Kin. Kin parece estar em vantagem, mas Shikamaru usa seu Jutsu Possessão da Sombra. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Kunoichi Assassina E Um Trêmulo Shikamaru
programme.desc: Naruto: A Kunoichi Assassina E Um Trêmulo Shikamaru - T01E43

programme.title: 2020. No sétimo combate, Naruto enfrenta Kiba, que traz seu cachorro Akamaru. Kiba usa o Jutsu Quatro Patas para atacar Naruto, que consegue virar a mesa. Entretanto, Akamaru e Kiba consomem Pílulas de Comida e começam um ataque intenso contra Naruto. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Akamaru Se Revela, Quem É O Melhor Cachorro?
programme.desc: Naruto: Akamaru Se Revela, Quem É O Melhor Cachorro? - T01E44

programme.title: 2020. Depois de consumir Pílulas de Comida, os níveis de chakra de Kiba e Akamaru aumentam, e ambos começam a contra-atacar Naruto. Naruto usa Jutsu de Transformação contra Kiba e tenta ganhar com uma nova manobra secreta. O que será que Naruto planejou?! Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Ataque Surpresa, A Arma Secreta do Naruto
programme.desc: Naruto: Ataque Surpresa, A Arma Secreta do Naruto - T01E45

programme.title: 2020. No oitavo combate, os primos Hinata e Neji do clã Hyuga se enfrentam. Embora a tímida Hinata não seja páreo para a agressividade de Neji, ela consegue ganhar força ao escutar as palavras de Naruto. Como será que esta batalha terminará? Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Byakugan: Hinata Ganha Coragem! - T01E46

programme.title: 2020. Hinata enfrenta Neji, mas ele ataca o ponto de pressão dela com Byakugan (olhos brancos). O fluxo de chakra de Hinata para, e ela quase perde a consciência. Ela encontra coragem ao lembrar como Naruto não desiste de nenhuma dificuldade. Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Uma Derrota Digna - T01E47

programme.title: 2020. No nono combate, Gaara finalmente aparece e seu oponente é Lee, um especialista em taijutsu (técnica física). Lee usa esta poderosa técnica contra Gaara, que manipula areia de sua cabaça. Então, a Armadura de Areia de Gaara finalmente se solta... Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Gaara Conta Rock Lee, O Poder Da Juventude Explode
programme.desc: Naruto: Gaara Conta Rock Lee, O Poder Da Juventude Explode - T01E48

programme.title: 2020. Lee usa a técnica banida, Lótus Primária, para atacar Gaara. A luta parece ter terminado, mas a manobra apenas danifica a proteção feita pela areia de Gaara. Imóvel após de ter usado Lótus Primária, Lee é lançado facilmente por toda parte por Gaara. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Força Oculta De Lee: Um Jutsu Secreto Proibido
programme.desc: Naruto: A Força Oculta De Lee: Um Jutsu Secreto Proibido - T01E49

programme.title: 2020. Lee decide usar a manobra proibida, Lótus Oculta, que libera três ou mais dos oito portais que possuem a concentração dos pontos de chakra. Quando os oito portais se abrem, o usuário pode morrer. Mas Gaara responde com seu próprio ataque, Ataúde de Areia. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: O Quinto Portão, Um Ninja Esplêndido
programme.desc: Naruto: O Quinto Portão, Um Ninja Esplêndido - T01E50

programme.title: 2020. No último combate das preliminares, Choji luta contra o capanga de Orochimaru, Dosu. As preliminares finalmente terminam, e o Hokage revela a terceira prova, enquanto Orochimaru começa secretamente seu plano maligno. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Uma Sombra Na Escuridão: O Perigo Se Aproxima De Sasuke
programme.desc: Naruto: Uma Sombra Na Escuridão: O Perigo Se Aproxima De Sasuke - T01E51

programme.title: 2020. Na preparação para a terceira prova, Kakashi escolhe Ebisu para treinar Naruto. Ebisu diz a Naruto que ele ainda não controla seu chakra o suficiente e o faz caminhar sobre água. Naruto aprende rápido e impressiona Ebisu. Então, uma figura aparece... Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Ebisu Volta: O Treinamento Mais Duro De Naruto
programme.desc: Naruto: Ebisu Volta: O Treinamento Mais Duro De Naruto - T01E52

programme.title: 2020. Jiraiya, um dos Sannin lendários, aparece de repente diante de Ebisu e Naruto. Naruto dá a Jiraiya o apelido de "Sábio Tarado". Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Após Muito Tempo...Jiraiya Retorna! - T01E53

programme.title: 2020. O ninja do Som, Dosu, aparece diante de Gaara e pretende derrotá-lo, mas o oposto acontece. Um jonin da Aldeia da Areia e Kabuto os observam secretamente. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Jutsu De Invocação : A Sabedoria Do Sábio Do Sapo!
programme.desc: Naruto: Jutsu De Invocação : A Sabedoria Do Sábio Do Sapo! - T01E54

programme.title: 2020. Naruto continua seu treino com Jiraiya para dominar o Jutsu de Invocação, que chama várias criaturas selvagens. Mas ele tem dificuldades em controlar o Chacra da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Um Sentimento De Anseio, Uma Flor Cheia De Esperança
programme.desc: Naruto: Um Sentimento De Anseio, Uma Flor Cheia De Esperança - T01E55

programme.title: 2020. Já se passaram três semanas que Naruto treina com Jiraiya. E Naruto esteve a ponto de cair várias vezes. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Viva Ou Morra : Arrisque Tudo Para Ganhar Tudo
programme.desc: Naruto: Viva Ou Morra : Arrisque Tudo Para Ganhar Tudo - T01E56

programme.title: 2020. Naruto finalmente realiza o Chacra de Nove Caudas e utiliza o Jutsu de Invocação. Gamabunta aparece e não acredita que Naruto o invocou. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Ele Voa!Ele Salta!Ele Espreita!O Chefe Sapo Aparece!
programme.desc: Naruto: Ele Voa!Ele Salta!Ele Espreita!O Chefe Sapo Aparece! - T01E57

programme.title: 2020. No dia da prova, Gaara desaparece do lugar que o ninja da Areia estava ficando e vai para o hospital da Aldeia da Folha. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Hospital Sitiado : A Mão Do Mal Revelada!
programme.desc: Naruto: Hospital Sitiado : A Mão Do Mal Revelada! - T01E58

programme.title: 2020. O dia da prova chega finalmente. O primeiro oponente de Naruto é Neji Hyuga. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: As Rodadas Finais : A Corrida Para Arena De Batalha
programme.desc: Naruto: As Rodadas Finais : A Corrida Para Arena De Batalha - T01E59

programme.title: 2020. Finalmente, a Prova Chunin começa com oito ninjas que foram qualificados nas preliminares. Mas ninguém sabe onde Sasuke está. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Byakugan Contra O Jutsu Clones Das Sombras!
programme.desc: Naruto: Byakugan Contra O Jutsu Clones Das Sombras! - T01E60

programme.title: 2020. Naruto não consegue usar o Jutsu Clones das Sombras contra Neji que consegue ver seu pontos de chacra! Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Derradeira Defesa : No Ponto Zero!
programme.desc: Naruto: A Derradeira Defesa : No Ponto Zero! - T01E61

programme.title: 2020. A batalha entre Naruto e Neji continua, e Neji demonstra seu enorme poder. Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: O Verdadeiro Poder Do Fracassado! - T01E62

programme.title: 2020. Derrotado por Naruto, Neji é levado para o hospital, quando o tio de Neji, Hiashi, aparece. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Bata Ou Desista ! As Rodadas Finais Ficam Complicadas!
programme.desc: Naruto: Bata Ou Desista ! As Rodadas Finais Ficam Complicadas! - T01E63

programme.title: 2020. A luta de Sasuke é adiada. É a vez de Shikamaru, mas ele não tem vontade de lutar por pensar que a luta dele seja apenas um combate secundário… Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Motivação Zero : O Cara Com Inveja Da Nuvem
programme.desc: Naruto: Motivação Zero : O Cara Com Inveja Da Nuvem - T01E64

programme.title: 2020. Na luta entre Shikamaru e Temari, Shikamaru que tem a vantagem faz uma decisão surpreendente. Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Folha Dançante, Areia Contorcida - T01E65

programme.title: 2020. A luta antecipada de Sasuke e Gaara começa. Gaara sinistramente fala com si mesmo, como se estivesse falando com outra pessoa. Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Jutsu Do Sobrancelhudo ... Stilo Sasuke! - T01E66

programme.title: 2020. Os movimentos e a velocidade de Sasuke são idênticas ao taijustu de Lee. Mas Gaara não é um oponente que pode ser derrotado somente por taijutsu. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: “Atrasado Para O Show, Mas Pronto Para Lutar ...A Derradeira Técnica Secreta Nasce!"
programme.desc: Naruto: “Atrasado Para O Show, Mas Pronto Para Lutar ...A Derradeira Técnica Secreta Nasce!" - T01E67

programme.title: 2020. Durante o combate, alguém usou genjutsu para que todos na arena caíssem no sono. Os ninjas da Areia, liderados por Orochimaru, começaram seu plano para destruir a Aldeia Oculta da Folha. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Zero Hora! A Destruição Da Aldeia Da Folha Começa !
programme.desc: Naruto: Zero Hora! A Destruição Da Aldeia Da Folha Começa ! - T01E68

programme.title: 2020. Os ninjas do Som e da Areia, juntos com Orochimaru, começaram a destruir a Aldeia Oculta da Folha. A arena se tornou em um campo de batalha. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Aldeia Em Angústia: Uma Nova Missão Nível “A” !
programme.desc: Naruto: Aldeia Em Angústia: Uma Nova Missão Nível “A” ! - T01E69

programme.title: 2020. Junto com Pakkun, Naruto, Sakura e Shikamaru estão em busca de Sasuke. Pakkun sente nove dos homens de Orochimaru vindo por eles. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Umociosoéposto Em Ação ... Chega De Preguiça !
programme.desc: Naruto: Umociosoéposto Em Ação ... Chega De Preguiça ! - T01E70

programme.title: 2020. Orochimaru prende o Hokage dentro de uma barreira e continuam batalhando. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Uma luta incomparável, Hokage Contra Hokage!
programme.desc: Naruto: Uma luta incomparável, Hokage Contra Hokage! - T01E71

programme.title: 2020. Sasuke finalmente alcança Gaara, Temari e Kankuro. Kankuro escapa com Gaara, deixando Temari para encarar Sasuke. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Um Erro Do Passado ... Um Rosto Revelado !
programme.desc: Naruto: Um Erro Do Passado ... Um Rosto Revelado ! - T01E72

programme.title: 2020. A intensa batalha entre Orochimaru e o Hokage continua. Finalmente, o Hokage decide usar um jutsu que Orochimaru não conhece, o Jutsu de Selamanto conhecido como Selo Ceifeiro da Morte. Gêneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: Técnica Secreta Proibida ... Selo Ceifeiro Da Morte !
programme.desc: Naruto: Técnica Secreta Proibida ... Selo Ceifeiro Da Morte ! - T01E73

programme.title: 2020. Shino aparece durante a batalha de Sasuke e Kankuro. Shino encara Kankura, permitindo que Sasuke vá atrás de Gaara. Gêneros: Anime

programme.desc: Naruto: Uma Verdade Surpreendente: A Identidade Do Gaara Aparece! - T01E74

programme.sub-title: A Decisão De Sasuke: Pressionado Ao Extremo!
programme.desc: Naruto: A Decisão De Sasuke: Pressionado Ao Extremo! - T01E75

programme.title: 2020. Naruto e Sakura conseguem alcançar Sasuke que está desmaiado e sem força. Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: O Assassino Da Noite Enluarada - T01E76

programme.title: 2020. Naruto é incapaz de lutar contra o poder imenso de Gaara. Enquanto Naruto declara que ele luta por seus companheiros, Gaara fala que ele luta por si. Gêneros: Anime

programme.desc: Naruto: Luz Contra Escuridão ...Os Dois Rostos De Gaara ! - T01E77

programme.title: 2020. Naruto é incapaz de lutar contra a força incrível de Gaara. Entretanto, depois de ver Sasuke arriscando a vida para salvar ele e Sakura... Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Manual Do Ninja Naruto!Pode Crer ! - T01E78

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lágrimas De Sakura - T01E43
programme.desc: 2008. Guy se arrepende ao ver seus três alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxigênio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha - T01E44

Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lágrimas escorrem em seu rosto. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laços - T01E48
programme.desc: 2008. Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cópias idênticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forçado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vovó Chiyo e Sakura não façam nada precipitado.
